   20: 
   21: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   22: %%%
   23: %%% Define to run outside of test server
   24: %%%
   25: %%% -define(STANDALONE,1).
   26: %%%
   27: %%%
   28: %%% Define for debug output
   29: %%%
   30: %%% -define(debug,1).
   31: 
   32: -module(trace_call_time_SUITE).
   33: 
   34: %% Exported end user tests
   35: 
   36: -export([seq/3, seq_r/3]).
   37: -export([loaded/1, a_function/1, a_called_function/1, dec/1, nif_dec/1, dead_tracer/1,
   38:         return_stop/1,reset/1,catch_crash/1]).
   39: 
   40: -define(US_ERROR, 10000).
   41: -define(R_ERROR, 0.8).
   42: -define(SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME, 10).
   43: 
   44: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   45: %% Result examination macros
   46: 
   47: -define(CT(P,MFA),{trace,P,call,MFA}).
   48: -define(CTT(P, MFA),{trace_ts,P,call,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
   49: -define(RF(P,MFA,V),{trace,P,return_from,MFA,V}).
   50: -define(RFT(P,MFA,V),{trace_ts,P,return_from,MFA,V,{_,_,_}}).
   51: -define(RT(P,MFA),{trace,P,return_to,MFA}).
   52: -define(RTT(P,MFA),{trace_ts,P,return_to,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
   53: 
   54: -ifdef(debug).
   55: -define(dbgformat(A,B),io:format(A,B)).
   56: -else.
   57: -define(dbgformat(A,B),noop).
   58: -endif.
   59: 
   60: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   61: 
   62: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   63: 
   64: %% When run in test server.
   65: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   66: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   67: -export([basic/1, on_and_off/1, info/1,
   68:          apply_bif_bug/1, abb_worker/1,
   69:          disable_ongoing/1,
   70: 	 pause_and_restart/1, scheduling/1, called_function/1, combo/1, 
   71: 	 bif/1, nif/1]).
   72: 
   73: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   74:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false,
   75:                          [local,meta,call_time,call_count,call_memory]),
   76:     erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time,call_count]),
   77:     timer:now_diff(now(),now()),
   78:     Config.
   79: 
   80: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   81:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false,
   82:                          [local,meta,call_time,call_count,call_memory]),
   83:     erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time,call_count]),
   84:     erlang:trace(all, false, [all]),
   85:     ok.
   86: 
   87: suite() ->
   88:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   89:      {timetrap, {minutes, 10}}].
   90: 
   91: all() ->
   92:     [basic, on_and_off, info, pause_and_restart, scheduling,
   93:      disable_ongoing,
   94:      apply_bif_bug,
   95:      combo, bif, nif, called_function, dead_tracer, return_stop,
   96:      reset,
   97:      catch_crash].
   98: 
   99: %% Tests basic call time trace
  100: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  101:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  102:     M = 900,
  103:     %%
  104:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  105:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  106:     Pid = setup(),
  107:     {L,  T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> (X+1) end) end),
  108:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq,   3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  109:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [], none),
  110: 
  111:     {Lr, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> (X+1) end) end),
  112:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq,   3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  113:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Pid, 1, 0, 0}], T2/M),
  114:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  115:     L = lists:reverse(Lr),
  116: 
  117:     %%
  118:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  119:     Pid ! quit,
  120:     ok.
  121: 
  122: %% Tests disable ongoing call_time traced function
  123: disable_ongoing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  124:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  125:     %%
  126:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_a, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  127:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_b, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  128:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_c, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  129:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_d, 0}, true, [call_time]),
  130: 
  131:     Pid = setup(),
  132: 
  133:     Self = self(),
  134:     Pid  ! {self(), execute, fun() -> disong_a(Self) end},
  135: 
  136:     c_ready = receive M1 -> M1 end,
  137: 
  138:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_b,1}, false, [call_time]),
  139: 
  140:     Pid ! go_on,
  141: 
  142:     {Pid, answer, _} = receive M2 -> M2
  143:                        after 1000 -> timeout end,
  144: 
  145:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  146:     Pid ! quit,
  147:     ok.
  148: 
  149: disong_a(Pid) ->
  150:     ForceStack = id(a),
  151:     disong_b(Pid),
  152:     disong_d(),
  153:     ForceStack.
  154: 
  155: disong_b(Pid) ->
  156:     ForceStack = id(b),
  157:     disong_c(Pid),
  158:     ForceStack.
  159: 
  160: disong_c(Pid) ->
  161:     Pid ! c_ready,
  162:     receive
  163:         go_on -> ok
  164:     end.
  165: 
  166: disong_d() ->
  167:     ok.
  168: 
  169: id(I) ->
  170:     I.
  171: 
  172: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  173: 
  174: 
  175: %% "Tests turning trace parameters on and off
  176: on_and_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  177:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  178:     M = 100,
  179:     %%
  180:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  181:     Pid = setup(),
  182:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, seq, [1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end]}),
  183:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  184: 
  185:     N = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  186:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  187:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  188: 
  189:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  190:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  191:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T3),
  192: 
  193:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, false, [call_time]),
  194:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, false, none),
  195:     {L, _T4} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  196:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, false, none),
  197:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [], none),
  198:     {Lr, T5} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  199:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T5),
  200: 
  201:     N = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  202:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, false, none),
  203:     {Lr, _T6} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  204:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, false, none),
  205:     L = lists:reverse(Lr),
  206:     %%
  207:     Pid ! quit,
  208:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  209:     ok.
  210: 
  211: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  212: 
  213: %% Tests the trace_info BIF
  214: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  215:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  216:     %%
  217:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,3}, true, [call_time]),
  218:     {call_time,[]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  219:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, pause, [call_time]),
  220:     {call_time,[]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  221:     {all,[_|_]=L} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, all),
  222:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, L),
  223:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, restart, [call_time]),
  224:     {call_time,[]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  225:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, false, [call_time]),
  226:     {call_time,false} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  227:     {all,false} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, all),
  228:     %%
  229:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  230:     ok.
  231: 
  232: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  233: 
  234: %% Tests pausing and restarting call time counters
  235: pause_and_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  236:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  237:     M = 100,
  238:     Pid = setup(),
  239:     %%
  240:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  241:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [], none),
  242:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  243:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T1),
  244:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, pause, [call_time]),
  245:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T1),
  246:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  247:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T2),
  248:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, restart, [call_time]),
  249:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [], none),
  250:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  251:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T3),
  252:     %%
  253:     Pid ! quit,
  254:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  255:     ok.
  256: 
  257: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  258: 
  259: %% Tests in/out scheduling of call time counters
  260: scheduling(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  261:     P  = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  262:     M  = 1000000,
  263:     Np = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  264:     F  = 12,
  265: 
  266:     %% setup load processes
  267:     %% (single, no internal calls)
  268: 
  269:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,loaded,2}, true, [call_time]),
  270: 
  271:     Pids     = [setup() || _ <- lists:seq(1, F*Np)],
  272:     {_Ls,T1} = execute(Pids, {?MODULE,loaded,[M]}),
  273:     [Pid ! quit || Pid <- Pids],
  274: 
  275:     %% logic dictates that each process will get ~ 1/F of the schedulers time
  276: 
  277:     {call_time, CT} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,loaded,2}, call_time),
  278: 
  279:     lists:foreach(fun (Pid) ->
  280:                           ok = case check_process_time(lists:keysearch(Pid, 1, CT), M, F, T1) of
  281:                                    schedule_time_error ->
  282:                                        test_server:comment("Warning: Failed time ratio"),
  283:                                        ok;
  284:                                    Other -> Other
  285:                                end
  286:                   end, Pids),
  287:     P  = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  288:     ok.
  289: 
  290: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  291: 
  292: %% "Tests combining local call trace and meta trace with call time trace
  293: combo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  294:     Self = self(),
  295:     Nbc = 3,
  296:     MetaMs = [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  297:     Flags = lists:sort([call, return_to]),
  298:     LocalTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(5 + Nbc + 3, Self) end),
  299:     MetaTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(9 + Nbc + 3, Self) end),
  300:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, [], [local]),
  301:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  302:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, MetaMs, [{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  303:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_count]),
  304:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_memory]),
  305: 
  306:     % bifs
  307:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, [], [local]),
  308:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  309:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, MetaMs, [{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  310:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_count]),
  311:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_memory]),
  312: 
  313:     1 = erlang:trace(Self, true, [{tracer,LocalTracer} | Flags]),
  314:     %%
  315:     {traced,local} =
  316:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, traced),
  317:     {match_spec,[]} =
  318:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, match_spec),
  319:     {meta,MetaTracer} =
  320:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, meta),
  321:     {meta_match_spec,MetaMs} =
  322:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, meta_match_spec),
  323:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [], none),
  324: 
  325:     %% check empty trace_info for ?MODULE:seq_r/3
  326:     {all,[_|_]=TraceInfo}     = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, all),
  327:     io:format("TraceInfo=~p\n",[TraceInfo]),
  328:     {value,{traced,local}}    = lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfo),
  329:     {value,{match_spec,[]}}   = lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfo),
  330:     {value,{meta,MetaTracer}} = lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfo),
  331:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MetaMs}} = lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfo),
  332:     {value,{call_count,0}} = lists:keysearch(call_count, 1, TraceInfo),
  333:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, TraceInfo),
  334:     {value,{call_memory,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_memory, 1, TraceInfo),
  335: 
  336:     %% check empty trace_info for erlang:term_to_binary/1
  337:     {all, [_|_] = TraceInfoBif} = erlang:trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, all),
  338:     {value,{traced,local}}     = lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  339:     {value,{match_spec,[]}}    = lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  340:     {value,{meta, MetaTracer}}  = lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  341:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MetaMs}} = lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  342:     {value,{call_count,0}} = lists:keysearch(call_count, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  343:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  344:     {value,{call_memory,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_memory, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  345: 
  346:     %%
  347:     [3,2,1] = seq_r(1, 3, fun(X) -> X+1 end),
  348:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  349:     with_bif(Nbc),
  350:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  351:     TimeB = erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond),
  352:     %%
  353: 
  354:     List = collect(100),
  355:     {MetaR, LocalR} =
  356:     lists:foldl(
  357:       fun ({P,X}, {M,L}) when P == MetaTracer ->
  358:               {[X|M],L};
  359:           ({P,X}, {M,L}) when P == LocalTracer ->
  360:               {M,[X|L]}
  361:       end,
  362:       {[],[]},
  363:       List),
  364:     Meta = lists:reverse(MetaR),
  365:     Local = lists:reverse(LocalR),
  366: 
  367:     [?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_]}),
  368:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_,[]]}),
  369:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[2,3,_,[1]]}),
  370:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[3,3,_,[2,1]]}),
  371:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  372:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  373:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  374:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,3},[3,2,1]),
  375:      ?CTT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[3]}), % bif
  376:      ?RFT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,1},<<131,97,3>>),
  377:      ?CTT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[2]}),
  378:      ?RFT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,1},<<131,97,2>>)
  379:     ] = Meta,
  380: 
  381:     [?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_]}),
  382:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_,[]]}),
  383:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[2,3,_,[1]]}),
  384:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[3,3,_,[2,1]]}),
  385:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,combo,1}),
  386:      ?CT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[3]}), % bif
  387:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,with_bif,1}),
  388:      ?CT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[2]}),
  389:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,with_bif,1})
  390:     ] = Local,
  391: 
  392:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Self,1,0,0}], 1),
  393:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Self,3,0,0}], 1),
  394:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Self,1,0,0}], 1),
  395:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Self,3,0,0}], 1),
  396:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, [{self(), Nbc - 1, 0, 0}], TimeB),
  397:     %%
  398:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [local,meta,call_time]),
  399:     erlang:trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time]),
  400:     erlang:trace(all, false, [all]),
  401:     ok.
  402: 
  403: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  404: 
  405: %% Tests tracing of bifs
  406: bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  407:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  408:     M = 5000000,
  409:     %%
  410:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, binary_to_term, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  411:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  412:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, with_bif, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  413:     Pid = setup(),
  414:     {L, Tot1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_bif(M) end),
  415: 
  416:     {call_time,[{Pid,_,S,Us}]}=WB = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,with_bif,1}, call_time),
  417:     T1 = Tot1 - (S*1000_000 + Us),
  418: 
  419:     B2T = erlang:trace_info({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, call_time),
  420:     T2B = erlang:trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, call_time),
  421:     io:format("with_bif       = ~p\n", [WB]),
  422:     io:format("binary_to_term = ~p\n", [B2T]),
  423:     io:format("term_to_binary = ~p\n", [T2B]),
  424:     Sum = us(WB) + us(B2T) + us(T2B),
  425:     io:format("Sum  = ~p us\n", [Sum]),
  426:     io:format("Tot1 = ~p us  Diff = ~p us\n", [Tot1, Tot1-Sum]),
  427:     ok = check_trace_info_ret({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}],
  428:                               T1/2, B2T),
  429:     ok = check_trace_info_ret({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}],
  430:                               T1/2, T2B),
  431: 
  432:     % disable term2binary
  433: 
  434:     2 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, false, [call_time]),
  435: 
  436:     {L, _T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_bif(M) end),
  437: 
  438:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, [{Pid, M*2 - 2, 0, 0}], T1),
  439:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, false, none),
  440: 
  441:     %%
  442:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  443:     Pid ! quit,
  444:     ok.
  445: 
  446: us({call_time,[{_,_,S,Us}]}) ->
  447:     S*1000_000 + Us.
  448: 
  449: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  450: 
  451: %% Tests tracing of nifs
  452: nif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  453:     load_nif(Config),
  454:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  455:     M = 5000000,
  456:     %%
  457:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, nif_dec,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  458:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE, with_nif, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  459:     Pid = setup(),
  460:     {_, Tot1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_nif(M) end),
  461: 
  462:     {call_time,[{Pid,_,S,Us}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,with_nif,1}, call_time),
  463:     T1 = Tot1 - (S*1000000 + Us),
  464: 
  465:     % the nif is called M - 1 times, the last time the function with 'with_nif'
  466:     % returns ok and does not call the nif.
  467:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, nif_dec,  1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}], T1),
  468: 
  469:     %%
  470:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  471:     Pid ! quit,
  472:     ok.
  473: 
  474: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  475: 
  476: %% Tests combining nested function calls and that the time accumulates to the right function
  477: called_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  478:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  479:     M = 2100,
  480:     Pid = setup(),
  481:     %%
  482:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,a_function,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  483:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  484:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  485: 
  486:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,a_called_function,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  487:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  488:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M, 0, 0}],
  489:                           T1 + M*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME),
  490:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_called_function, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  491: 
  492: 
  493:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,dec,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  494:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  495:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M+M, 0, 0}],
  496:                           T1 + (M+M)*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME),
  497:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_called_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M, 0, 0}],
  498:                           T2 + M*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME ),
  499:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, dec, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T3),
  500: 
  501:     Pid ! quit,
  502:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  503:     ok.
  504: 
  505: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  506: 
  507: dead_tracer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  508:     TracedMFAs = dead_tracer_mfas(),
  509: 
  510:     Self = self(),
  511:     FirstTracer = tracer(),
  512:     StartTracing = fun() -> turn_on_tracing(Self) end,
  513:     tell_tracer(FirstTracer, StartTracing),
  514:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8] = seq(1, 8, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  515:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, FirstTracer),
  516:     FirstTracer ! quit,
  517:     receive
  518:         {'DOWN',Ref,process,FirstTracer,normal} ->
  519:             ok
  520:     end,
  521:     erlang:yield(),
  522: 
  523:     %% Collect and check that we only get call_time info for the current process.
  524:     Info1 = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  525:     [] = other_than_self(Info1),
  526:     io:format("~p\n", [Info1]),
  527: 
  528:     %% Note that we have not turned off tracing for the current process,
  529:     %% but that the tracer has terminated. No more call_time information should be recorded.
  530:     [1,2,3] = seq(1, 3, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  531:     [] = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  532: 
  533:     %% When we start a second tracer process, that tracer process must
  534:     %% not inherit the tracing flags and the dead tracer (even though
  535:     %% we used set_on_spawn).
  536:     SecondTracer = tracer(),
  537:     tell_tracer(SecondTracer, StartTracing),
  538:     Seq20 = lists:seq(1, 20),
  539:     Seq20 = seq(1, 20, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  540:     Info2 = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  541:     io:format("~p\n", [Info2]),
  542:     [] = other_than_self(Info2),
  543:     SecondTracer ! quit,
  544: 
  545:     ok.
  546: 
  547: other_than_self(Info) ->
  548:     [{Pid,MFA} || {MFA,[{Pid,_,_,_}]} <- Info,
  549:                   Pid =/= self()].
  550: 
  551: tell_tracer(Tracer, Fun) ->
  552:     Tracer ! {execute,self(),Fun},
  553:     receive
  554:         {Tracer,executed} ->
  555:             ok
  556:     end.
  557: 
  558: tracer() ->
  559:     spawn_link(fun Loop() ->
  560:                       receive
  561:                           quit ->
  562:                               ok;
  563:                           {execute,From,Fun} ->
  564:                               Fun(),
  565:                               From ! {self(),executed},
  566:                               Loop()
  567:                       end
  568:               end).
  569: 
  570: turn_on_tracing(Pid) ->
  571:     _ = erlang:trace(Pid, true, [call,set_on_spawn]),
  572:     _ = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  573:     _ = now(),
  574:     ok.
  575: 
  576: %% We want to trace functions local to this module as well as all BIFs, and for
  577: %% the latter we need to ensure that their modules are loaded.
  578: dead_tracer_mfas() ->
  579:     Modules = [M || {M,_F,_A} <- erlang:system_info(snifs)],
  580:     Whitelist0 = gb_sets:from_list(Modules),
  581:     Whitelist = case code:ensure_modules_loaded(Modules) of
  582:                   {error, Reasons} ->
  583:                       Blacklist = gb_sets:from_list([M || {M, _} <- Reasons]),
  584:                       gb_sets:subtract(Whitelist0, Blacklist);
  585:                   ok ->
  586:                       Whitelist0
  587:               end,
  588:     EligibleSNIFs = [MFA || {M,_F,_A}=MFA <- erlang:system_info(snifs),
  589:                             gb_sets:is_element(M, Whitelist)],
  590:     [{?MODULE,F,A} || {F,A} <- module_info(functions)] ++ EligibleSNIFs.
  591: 
  592: collect_all_info([MFA|T]) ->
  593:     CallTime = erlang:trace_info(MFA, call_time),
  594:     erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, restart, [call_time]),
  595:     case CallTime of
  596:         {call_time,false} ->
  597:             collect_all_info(T);
  598:         {call_time,[]} ->
  599:             collect_all_info(T);
  600:         {call_time,[_|_]=List} ->
  601:             [{MFA,List}|collect_all_info(T)]
  602:     end;
  603: collect_all_info([]) -> [].
  604: 
  605: 
  606: %% OTP-16111: Verify call_time does not increase after traced function returns.
  607: return_stop(_Config) ->
  608:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  609:     %%
  610:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,aaa,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  611:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,bbb,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  612:     Pid = setup(),
  613:     {aaa, T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> aaa()  end),
  614:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  615:     io:format("T1=~p us, US1=~p us\n", [T1, US1]),
  616:     true = (US1 =< T1),
  617: 
  618:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  619: 
  620:     execute(Pid, fun() -> loaded(1000000)  end),
  621:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  622: 
  623:     {bbb,  _} = execute(Pid, fun() -> bbb()  end),
  624:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  625: 
  626:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,spinner,  1}, true, [call_time]),
  627:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,quicky,  0}, true, [call_time]),
  628:     {spinner,  T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> spinner(1000000)  end),
  629:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, SpS, SpUS}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,spinner,1}, call_time),
  630:     Spinner = SpS*1000000 + SpUS,
  631:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, Quicky}]} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,quicky,0}, call_time),
  632:     io:format("T2=~p us, Spinner=~p us, Quicky=~p us\n", [T2, Spinner, Quicky]),
  633: 
  634:     %% Before fix: quicky() got attributed the call_time of its caller spinner().
  635:     true = (Quicky =< Spinner),
  636:     true = (Spinner =< T2),
  637: 
  638:     %%
  639:     P = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  640:     Pid ! quit,
  641:     ok.
  642: 
  643: 
  644: aaa() ->
  645:     aaa.
  646: bbb() ->
  647:    bbb.
  648: 
  649: spinner(N) ->
  650:     quicky(),
  651:     loaded(N),
  652:     spinner.
  653: 
  654: quicky() ->
  655:     done.
  656: 
  657: %% OTP-19269: Verify call_time is reset correctly
  658: %% while traced functions are called.
  659: reset(_Config) ->
  660:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  661: 
  662:     CallTimeReader = fun({P,Cnt,_,_}) -> {P,Cnt} end,
  663:     reset_do(call_time, true, CallTimeReader),
  664:     reset_do(call_time, restart, CallTimeReader),
  665: 
  666:     CallMemoryReader = fun({P,Cnt,_}) -> {P,Cnt} end,
  667:     reset_do(call_memory, true, CallMemoryReader),
  668:     reset_do(call_memory, restart, CallMemoryReader),
  669:     ok.
  670: 
  671: reset_do(TraceType, ResetArg, InfoReader) ->
  672:     %%
  673:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,aaa, 0}, true, [TraceType]),
  674:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,bbb, 0}, true, [TraceType]),
  675: 
  676:     Np = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  677:     Tester = self(),
  678:     Pids = [begin
  679:                 Pid = spawn_opt(fun() ->
  680:                                         receive go -> ok end,
  681:                                         aaa(),
  682:                                         bbb(),
  683:                                         Tester ! {running, self()},
  684:                                         loop_aaa_bbb()
  685:                                 end,
  686:                                 [link, {scheduler,I}]),
  687:                 erlang:trace(Pid, true, [call]),
  688:                 Pid ! go,
  689:                 Pid
  690:             end
  691:             || I <- lists:seq(1,Np)],
  692: 
  693:     %% Wait for all to make at least one traced call
  694:     [receive {running, P} -> ok end || P <- Pids],
  695: 
  696:     {TraceType, AAA1} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, TraceType),
  697: 
  698:     io:format("Reset trace counters for aaa.\n", []),
  699:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,aaa, 0}, ResetArg, [TraceType]),
  700: 
  701:     {TraceType, AAA2} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, TraceType),
  702:     {TraceType, BBB} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,bbb,0}, TraceType),
  703: 
  704:     %% Verify counters are sane
  705:     lists:zipwith3(fun({P, ACnt1}=A1,
  706:                        {P, ACnt2}=A2,
  707:                        {P, BCnt}=B) ->
  708:                            io:format("A1=~p A2=~p B=~p\n", [A1,A2,B]),
  709:                            true = (ACnt1+ACnt2 =< BCnt)
  710:                   end,
  711:                   lists:sort(lists:map(InfoReader, AAA1)),
  712:                   lists:sort(lists:map(InfoReader, AAA2)),
  713:                   lists:sort(lists:map(InfoReader, BBB))),
  714: 
  715:     [P ! die || P <- Pids],
  716:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,aaa, 0}, false, [TraceType]),
  717:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,bbb, 0}, false, [TraceType]),
  718:     ok.
  719: 
  720: loop_aaa_bbb() ->
  721:     aaa = aaa(),
  722:     bbb = bbb(),
  723:     receive die -> ok
  724:     after 0 -> loop_aaa_bbb()
  725:     end.
  726: 
  727: 
  728: %% OTP-16994: next_catch returned a bogus stack pointer when call_time tracing
  729: %% was enabled, crashing the emulator.
  730: catch_crash(_Config) ->
  731:     Fun = id(fun() -> catch_crash_1() end),
  732: 
  733:     _ = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  734:     _ = erlang:trace(self(), true, [call]),
  735: 
  736:     Res = (catch Fun()),
  737: 
  738:     _ = erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  739:     _ = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call]),
  740: 
  741:     id(Res),
  742: 
  743:     ok.
  744: 
  745: catch_crash_1() ->
  746:     error(crash).
  747: 
  748: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  749: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  750: %% Local helpers
  751: 
  752: load_nif(Config) ->
  753:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  754:     ok = erlang:load_nif(filename:join(Path,"trace_nif"), 0).
  755: 
  756: 
  757: %% Stack recursive seq
  758: seq(Stop, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  759:     [Stop];
  760: seq(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  761:     [Start | seq(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ)].
  762: 
  763: 
  764: a_function(1) -> a_called_function(1);
  765: a_function(N) when N > 1 -> a_function(a_called_function(N)).
  766: 
  767: a_called_function(N) -> dec(N).
  768: 
  769: with_bif(1) -> ok;
  770: with_bif(N) ->
  771:     with_bif(erlang:binary_to_term(erlang:term_to_binary(N)) - 1).
  772: 
  773: with_nif(0) -> error;
  774: with_nif(1) -> ok;
  775: with_nif(N) ->
  776:     with_nif(?MODULE:nif_dec(N)).
  777: 
  778: 
  779: nif_dec(_) -> 0.
  780: 
  781: dec(N) ->
  782:     loaded(10000),
  783:     N - 1.
  784: 
  785: loaded(N) -> loaded(N, 1.0).
  786: loaded(N, M) when N > 1 -> loaded(N - 1, M * 1.0001);
  787: loaded(_, M) -> M.
  788: 
  789: 
  790: %% Tail recursive seq, result list is reversed
  791: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  792:     seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, []).
  793: 
  794: seq_r(Stop, Stop, _, R) ->
  795:     [Stop | R];
  796: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, R) ->
  797:     seq_r(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ, [Start | R]).
  798: 
  799: % Check call time tracing data and print mismatches
  800: check_trace_info(Mfa, Expect, Time) ->
  801:     check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, Expect, Time, erlang:trace_info(Mfa, call_time)).
  802: 
  803: check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, [{Pid, ExpectedC,_,_}] = Expect, Time, TraceInfo) ->
  804:     {call_time,[{Pid,Cnt,S,Us}]} = TraceInfo,
  805: 
  806:     {Mod, Name, Arity} = Mfa,
  807:     IsBuiltin = erlang:is_builtin(Mod, Name, Arity),
  808:     ok = if
  809:         %% Call count on BIFs may exceed number of calls as they often trap to
  810:         %% themselves.
  811:         IsBuiltin, Cnt >= ExpectedC ->
  812:             ok;
  813:         not IsBuiltin, Cnt =:= ExpectedC ->
  814:             ok;
  815:         true ->
  816:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p}~n"
  817:                       " - got call count ~w~p",
  818:                       [Mfa, Expect, Cnt]),
  819:             count_error
  820:     end,
  821: 
  822:     true = (S >= 0),
  823:     true = (Us >= 0),
  824:     Sum = S*1000_000 + Us,
  825:     if
  826:         abs(1 - Time/Sum) < ?R_ERROR; abs(Time - Sum) < ?US_ERROR ->
  827:             ok;
  828:         true ->
  829:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p (Time ~p us)}~n - got ~w "
  830:                       "s. ~w us. = ~w us. - ~w -> delta ~w (ratio ~.2f, "
  831:                       "should be 1.0)~n",
  832:                       [Mfa, Expect, Time,
  833:                        S, Us, Sum, Time, Sum - Time, Time/Sum]),
  834:             time_error
  835:     end;
  836: check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, Expect, _, TraceInfo) ->
  837:     case TraceInfo of
  838:         {call_time, Expect} ->
  839:             ok;
  840:         Other ->
  841:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p}~n - got ~p~n", [Mfa, Expect, Other]),
  842:             result_not_expected_error
  843:     end.
  844: 
  845: 
  846: %check process time
  847: check_process_time({value,{Pid, M, S, Us}}, M, F, Time) ->
  848:     Sum = S*1000000 + Us,
  849:     if
  850:         abs(1 - (F/(Time/Sum))) < ?R_ERROR ->
  851:             ok;
  852:         true ->
  853:             io:format("- Pid ~p, Got ratio ~.2f, expected ratio ~w~n", [Pid, Time/Sum,F]),
  854:             schedule_time_error
  855:     end;
  856: check_process_time(Other, M, _, _) ->
  857:     io:format(" - Got ~p, expected count ~w~n", [Other, M]),
  858:     error.
  859: 
  860: 
  861: 
  862: %% Message relay process
  863: relay_n(0, _) ->
  864:     ok;
  865: relay_n(N, Dest) ->
  866:     receive Msg ->
  867:                 Dest ! {self(), Msg},
  868:                 relay_n(N-1, Dest)
  869:     end.
  870: 
  871: 
  872: 
  873: %% Collect received messages
  874: collect(Time) ->
  875:     Ref = erlang:start_timer(Time, self(), done),
  876:     L = lists:reverse(collect([], Ref)),
  877:     ?dbgformat("Got: ~p~n",[L]),
  878:     L.
  879: 
  880: collect(A, 0) ->
  881:     receive
  882:         Mess ->
  883:             collect([Mess | A], 0)
  884:     after 0 ->
  885:               A
  886:     end;
  887: collect(A, Ref) ->
  888:     receive
  889:         {timeout, Ref, done} ->
  890:             collect(A, 0);
  891:         Mess ->
  892:             collect([Mess | A], Ref)
  893:     end.
  894: 
  895: setup() ->
  896:     setup([]).
  897: 
  898: setup(Opts) ->
  899:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun() -> loop() end,
  900:                    [link, {max_heap_size, 12000}]),
  901:     1 = erlang:trace(Pid, true, [call|Opts]),
  902:     Pid.
  903: 
  904: execute(Pids, Mfa) when is_list(Pids) ->
  905:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  906:     [P  ! {self(), execute, Mfa} || P <- Pids],
  907:     As = [receive {P, answer, Answer} -> Answer end || P <- Pids],
  908:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  909:     {As, erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond)};
  910: execute(P, Mfa) ->
  911:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  912:     P  ! {self(), execute, Mfa},
  913:     A  = receive {P, answer, Answer} -> Answer end,
  914:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  915:     {A, erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond)}.
  916: 
  917: 
  918: 
  919: loop() ->
  920:     receive
  921:         quit ->
  922:             ok;
  923:         {Pid, execute, Fun } when is_function(Fun) ->
  924:             %% Make sure we always run with the same amount of reductions.
  925:             erlang:yield(),
  926:             Pid ! {self(), answer, erlang:apply(Fun, [])},
  927:             loop();
  928:         {Pid, execute, {M, F, A}} ->
  929:             erlang:yield(),
  930:             Pid ! {self(), answer, erlang:apply(M, F, A)},
  931:             loop()
  932:     end.
  933: 
  934: %% OTP-17290, GH-4635
  935: apply_bif_bug(_Config) ->
  936:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, abb_worker, [self()]),
  937:     erlang:trace(Pid, true, [call]),
  938:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,abb_foo,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  939:     erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,display,1}, true, [call_time]),
  940:     Pid ! {call, erlang, display, ["Hej"]},
  941:     receive
  942:         done -> ok
  943:     end,
  944:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]).
  945: 
  946: abb_worker(Papa) ->
  947:     receive
  948:         {call, M, F, Args} ->
  949:             abb_foo(M, F, Args),
  950:             Papa ! done
  951:     end.
  952: 
  953: 
  954: abb_foo(M,F,Args) ->
  955:     apply(M,F,Args).
